title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre jazzed about totally revamping your appearance and style today. The defiant opposition between chic Venus and unconventional Uranus likely inspires you to go for shock value. But be careful not to make serious long-term changes now since your own tastes might quickly shift again later. Instead, shoot more to keep things interesting yet simple, not necessarily very provocative for its own sake. Designer John Maeda wrote, Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
